channel.title: R on Ángela Castillo-Gill
channel.description: Recent content in R on Ángela Castillo-Gill

item.title: NBA free throws analysis
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Who made the most shots between 2006 and 2016? 3.2 Who had the highest shots per free throw attempt between 2006 and 2016? 3.3 Who made the most shots each season? 3.4 What was the free throw attempt between 2006 and 2016 for the player that scored the most each season? 4 Results 5 Conclusion 1 Summary To see the the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site

item.title: Clustering: cereals, supermarket shelves, and sugar
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 4 Hierarchical clustering 5 Results 5.1 What are the difference between cereals in cluster? 5.2 Can we classify cereals into either cluster based on their names? 5.3 Which shelves have the most unhealthy cereals? 6 Conclusion 1 Summary To see the the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site Objectives: To find what what kind of clusters are there in the cereals dataset available on Kaggle.

item.title: Regression trees: predicting property prices
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 3.1 Missing values 3.2 Correlation 4 Regression trees - why use them? 4.1 Variable importance 5 Results 6 Conclusion 1 Summary To see the all the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site Objectives: To predict property prices using decision trees, specifically, the classification and regression algorithm. Challenge: First time applying decision trees.
